channel.title: plane on Title
channel.description: Recent content in plane on Title

item.title: A Window Seat, Please
item.description: I am a child of globalization. This means hours and hours of air time using low-cost companies visiting friends, family, or attending conferences. This is a compilation of photos during such trips across Europe. Some nice shots were possible especially when the weather played along. The tutle of this collection was stolen from Tao Ruspoli, a photographer and indie movie producer from the US whos work I really appreciate.
